about_the_game:
From Tkool Project comes Volume 1 of a series of inspiring music featuring themes for mystery, horror, futuristic and more! Using modern and retro synthesizer sounds, this sleek music pack creates both classic and modern cool atmospheres for your game developing project.

Whether you're on the lookout for the perfect theme for your epic saga or simply in need of creative music to listen to while you map, you can't go wrong with these 35 BGM!

Features:

35 total tracks
Mystery, horror, futuristic and modern theme
.M4A and .OGG format included.

Tracklist

1. MML1_BGM01_Reasoning1
2. MML1_BGM02_Reasoning2
3. MML1_BGM03_Reasoning3
